name: Temple
description: A sacred site of worship and reflection; adventurers might receive blessings, research lore, or clash with zealots.
atmosphere: The temple has a solemn, spiritual atmosphere with the rich scent of incense and the sound of religious ceremonies and the soft murmur of prayers. The air carries the weight of divine presence and the essential nature of spiritual connection, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of religious devotion and the mysteries of the divine that permeate this sacred space.
